name: [ANDROID] Escape From Zombie Bang City
description:
The city is infected. All you have is AK-47 and ammo. All you need is to escape from this nightmare. Go through the 3 missions and kill or be killed.
Hide, run and find ammo. In the last mission you'll come close to solve the main mystery.

Three Unique Missions to escape from infected city.
Fast and Dangerous Zombies all over the landscape. Shoot or run if you can't hide.
Find all 5 energy packs.

Google Play Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Aborgame.ZombieBangCity
